structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
SHERIFFS, CONSTABLES, AND COUNTY POLICE FORCE

law.catch_line: may employ retired police officer -- Qualifications.

text.section: A county sheriff's office in the Commonwealth of Kentucky may employ police officers who have retired under the State Police Retirement System, Kentucky Employees Retirement System, or the County Employees Retirement System as provided by KRS 70.291 to 70.293.

law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 71, sec. 2, effective June 24, 2015. -- Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 96, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2014.
